meanings.definition: A small creature with eight legs that spins webs to catch insects.
meanings.sent1: Spiders are skilled at spinning webs to catch their prey.
meanings.sent2: I saw a spider building a web in the corner of my room.
meanings.sent3: The spider chuckled as it watched a fly get caught in its web.
meanings.sent4: Her web of lies was as intricate and deceptive as a spider's web.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the spider's hairy legs sent shivers down my spine.

meanings.definition: A device with multiple legs used to hold objects in place.
meanings.sent1: The table wobbled until I adjusted the spiders underneath.
meanings.sent2: The spiders on the bottom of the chair kept it stable.
meanings.sent3: The spiders on the table seemed to have a mind of their own, adjusting whenever someone sat down.
meanings.sent4: The spiders on the piano legs gripped tightly, preventing any movement.
meanings.sent5: The spiders on the bookshelf legs were painted gold, adding a touch of elegance.

meanings.definition: A type of plant with long, thin stems.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with beautiful spiders swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bouquet of spiders to decorate the dining table.
meanings.sent3: The spiders in the vase added a unique touch to the room.
meanings.sent4: The spiders in the field danced gracefully under the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The spiders in the meadow created a sea of green and white.
